title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync
description: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
OB: When exporting a directory and placing the exported jar in the same directory, an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
EB: The exported jar file should not include itself to avoid the out of sync message.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Export a directory (project). 2. Place the exported jar file in the same directory. 3. Overwrite the exported jar file the second time. Verify that the out of sync message is displayed.
